topic.title: Built in search engine in at 1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D
topic.body: Hello @nofish, could you build in a search engine on the main page? It would make ZeroNet 10x more amazing than it already is! Thanks! :D

topic.title: [SUGGESTION] Make the '0' button movable.
topic.body: Hello @nofish and other developers, could you please make the '0' button movable as the button makes it hard to click some list items, for example, the Decentralized Web Summit (http://127.0.0.1:43110/16Ryx9pbfzaPb1dbttA6DiFojHQGqrMokU/).

1_1DUt2hdvamdyX1LtRC6YqoyUPRqGEJGdYY.body: I disagree, police are good people, it's just the minority that make them seem bad. Also, the police are there to enforce the law. You should be blaming the politicians and multi-billion dollar companies that are pushing for the internet to be censored.

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [quinzxv](#comment_1_17j27HKQPHHVbp3mmFQj7rRcjNDvDwiCji): Take your protein pills and put your helmet on!

He/she's been here for years. It's some Russian. XD
